Text:
JWhitt and All,

Thank you for your work in posting these torrents. As I live outside of the USA I very much appreciate these.
May All of you have a very safe, happy and prosperous New Years - May 2010 bless you.

Also, a prayer for Rush in hopes of his speedy recovery - We, and the USA, need him.

Bless You All.

jwhitt is an even bigger nigger than Rush, because he uploads these shows.

Hehehe!

there are one hell of a lot of maggots that hang around these uploads. looks like they could spend their time instead trying to get their iq above fifty. thanks jwhitt62 for all you do to get rush out to those of us without usa radio.
I too am a foreigner and able to listen to Rush thanks to you jh. Very best wishes for 2010.

Mark Steyn 29/12?
All the best for you and Rush!!

Oi jwhitt62,

Thanks much for your dedicated uploading of Rush in 2009. Best wishes for a great 2010 to you and yours.

Thank you jwhitt for the work you do in uploading Limbaugh every day - and thanks also to all the others who do the same :)

Have to agree with Tainan - prayers for Rush in hopes of a speedy and complete recovery. 

Happy New Year to fellow Rush fans! :)
